Title: God's Gonna Trouble the Water
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Bianca Sams, Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Charles Michael Davis, Yusuf Gatewood
Plot: Ivy reveals some startling news to Klaus about the dark magic that's been keeping him away from his family. Elijah turns to some unexpected allies to save Antoinette's life.
